wordbank.info: A living organism of the kind exemplified by trees, shrubs, herbs, grasses, ferns, and mosses.
A stream, brook, or minor tributary of a river.
A cold-blooded vertebrate of a class that includes snakes, lizards, crocodiles, turtles, and tortoises.
A biological community of interacting organisms and their physical environment.
A reptile that typically has a long body and tail, four legs, movable eyelids, and a rough, scaly, or spiny skin.
